AI Description: JAGS (Just Another Gibbs Sampler) is a program for analysis of Bayesian hierarchical models using Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) simulation. It is similar to WinBUGS and provides a flexible environment for specifying complex statistical models.
Core Features:
1. Bayesian hierarchical modeling
2. Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) simulation
3. Model specification
4. Posterior inference
5. Parameter estimation
General Tags: Bayesian Statistics, Hierarchical Modeling, Mcmc Simulation
